com.koalog.util.swing.control
Class DOMTree

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JTree
                  com.koalog.util.swing.control.Tree
                      com.koalog.util.swing.control.XMLTree
                          com.koalog.util.swing.control.DOMTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.Scrollable, java.io.Serializable
public class DOMTree
extends XMLTree

A tree that represent a XML file as a DOM document. Using the DOM representation for makes it easy to perform a save operation that does not destruct the unknown elements. However, keep in mind that it is not adapted to very large documents.

Available options:

  • IGNORE_UNKNOWN_ELEMENTS: by setting this option to true, the unknown tags are not displayed on the screen. The default value is false.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Get the state of a document.

Parameters:
doc - The document to check.
Returns:
